author: Soo Kim
title: More Than 150,000 People Have Recovered From Coronavirus Around the World, Including Over 90 Percent of China's Infected
description: Nearly 90 percent of China's confirmed cases have seen recoveries, while more than half of South Korea's confirmed infected population has recovered.
content:
The coronavirus outbreak has seen more than 152,000 recover from infection as of Monday, according to the latest figures from Johns Hopkins University.
The virus, which was first detected in Wuhan, a city in China's Hubei province, has affected more than 723… [+5057 chars]
